title: Descend
lyrics:
We’ve seen the miles
We drank the moon
We choose the sides
And judge the fools
What’s the matter, did the silence find you?

How’s it to feel to see the one thing you don’t need?

Come around come around this way



I won’t defend

You won’t surrender

How long do we go?

A long lost descent

We do it together

How long do we go?

You lead and we’ll follow



We’re safe and sound

Spoke up way too soon

We can all just close our eyes

And pray to god, we all pull through



What’s the matter, did the lights just blind you?

How's it feel to see the one thing we all need?

Come around come around this way



I won’t defend

You won’t surrender

How long do we go?

A long lost descent

We do it together

How long do we go?

You lead and we’ll follow



Surrender and follow

How does it feel to change?

In the darkest of days, we all fall down

One more mistake

The changes seem to fade



I won’t defend

You won’t surrender

How long do we go?

A long lost descent

We do it together

How long do we go?

You lead and we will follow



I won’t defend

You won’t surrender

How long do we go?

A long lost descent

We do it together

How long do we go?

You lead and we’ll follow



We’ll follow
